00047 MyTriggerSvc* MyTriggerSvc::GetMyTriggerSvc(){

00049                 fMyTriggerSvc = new MyTriggerSvc;

00054 void MyTriggerSvc::SetMyTrigger( G4String filename ){
00055         ReSet();
00056         std::ifstream fin_card(filename);
00057         if(!fin_card){
00058                 std::cout<<"In MyTriggerSvc::ReadOutputCard, cannot open "<<filename<<"!!!"<<std::endl;
00059                 G4Exception("MyTriggerSvc::ReadOutputCard()",
00060                                 "InvalidSetup", FatalException,
00061                                 "cannot find output card");
00062         }
00063         std::stringstream buf_card;
00064         G4String s_card;
00065         int n_TRIGGER_section_symbol = 0;
00066         G4String TRIGGERSECTIONNAME = "TRIGGERSECTION";
00067         while(getline(fin_card,s_card)){
00068                 buf_card.str("");
00069                 buf_card.clear();
00070                 buf_card<<s_card;
00071 
00072                 //eleminate useless lines
00073                 const char* c_card = s_card.c_str();
00074                 int length = strlen(c_card);
00075                 int offset = 0;
00076                 for ( ; offset < length; offset++ ){
00077                         if ( c_card[offset] != ' ' ) break;
00078                 }
00079                 if ( c_card[offset] == '#' || (c_card[offset] == '/' && c_card[offset+1] == '/') || length - offset == 0 ){
00080                         continue;
00081                 }
00082 
00083                 G4String name, unit;
00084                 buf_card>>name;
00085 
00086                 if ( n_TRIGGER_section_symbol == 0 ){
00087                         if ( name == TRIGGERSECTIONNAME ){
00088                                 n_TRIGGER_section_symbol++;
00089                         }
00090                 }
00091                 else if ( n_TRIGGER_section_symbol == 1 ){
00092                         int para;
00093                         buf_card>>para;
00094                         if ( name == TRIGGERSECTIONNAME ){
00095                                 n_TRIGGER_section_symbol++;
00096                         }
00097                         else if ( name == "minCdcHits" ){
00098                                 minCdcHits = para;
00099                         }
00100                         else if ( name == "minM_Hits" ){
00101                                 minM_Hits = para;
00102                         }
00103                         else if ( name == "minV_Hits" ){
00104                                 minV_Hits = para;
00105                         }
00106                         else if ( name == "minCorM_Hits" ){
00107                                 minCorM_Hits = para;
00108                         }
00109                         else if ( name == "minEleMom" ){
00110                                 std::string unit;
00111                                 buf_card>>unit;
00112                                 minEleMom = para*MyString2Anything::get_U(unit);
00113                         }
00114                         else if ( name == "minAntipNum" ){
00115                                 minAntipNum = para;
00116                         }
00117                         else if ( name == "minTracks" ){
00118                                 minTracks = para;
00119                         }
00120                         else{
00121                                 std::cout<<"In MyTriggerSvc::SetMyTrigger, unknown name: "<<name<<" in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00122                                 std::cout<<"Will ignore this line!"<<std::endl;
00123                         }
00124                 }
00125 
00126                 if ( n_TRIGGER_section_symbol > 1 ){
00127                         break;
00128                 }
00129         }
00130         buf_card.str("");
00131         buf_card.clear();
00132         if ( n_TRIGGER_section_symbol<= 1 ){
00133                 std::cout<<"*****************WARNING********************"<<std::endl;
00134                 std::cout<<"In MyTriggerSvc::ReadOutputCard, failed to find enough section seperators \""<<TRIGGERSECTIONNAME<<"\" for TRIGGER in file "<<filename<<std::endl;
00135                 std::cout<<"Will use default settings."<<std::endl;
00136                 std::cout<<"********************************************"<<std::endl;
00137         }
00138         fin_card.close();
00139         ShowOutCard();
00140         pMyDetectorManager = MyDetectorManager::GetMyDetectorManager();
00141         G4VSensitiveDetector* myVSD = 0;
00142         G4VSensitiveDetector* myVSD2 = 0;
00143         if ( minM_Hits != -1 ){ 
00144                 myVSD = pMyDetectorManager->GetSD("","M/MonitorSD");
00145                 if (myVSD){
00146                         myMonitorSD = dynamic_cast<MonitorSD*> (myVSD);
00147                         std::cout<<"myVSD @ ["<<(void*) myVSD<<"]"<<std::endl;
00148                         std::cout<<"myMonitorSD @ ["<<(void*) myMonitorSD<<"]"<<std::endl;
00149                 }
00150         }
00151         if ( minV_Hits != -1 ){ 
00152                 myVSD = pMyDetectorManager->GetSD("","V/MonitorSD");
00153                 if (myVSD){
00154                         myMonitorSD = dynamic_cast<MonitorSD*> (myVSD);
00155                         std::cout<<"myVSD @ ["<<(void*) myVSD<<"]"<<std::endl;
00156                         std::cout<<"myMonitorSD @ ["<<(void*) myMonitorSD<<"]"<<std::endl;
00157                 }
00158         }
00159         if ( minCorM_Hits != -1 ){ 
00160                 myVSD2 = pMyDetectorManager->GetSD("","M/MonitorSD");
00161                 if (myVSD2){
00162                         myMonitorSD2 = dynamic_cast<MonitorSD*> (myVSD2);
00163                         std::cout<<"myVSD2 @ ["<<(void*) myVSD2<<"]"<<std::endl;
00164                         std::cout<<"myMonitorSD2 @ ["<<(void*) myMonitorSD2<<"]"<<std::endl;
00165                 }
00166         }
00167         if ( minCdcHits != -1 || minCorM_Hits != -1 ){ 
00168                 myVSD = pMyDetectorManager->GetSD("CdcCell","CdcSD");
00169                 if (myVSD){
00170                         myCdcSD = dynamic_cast<CdcSD*> (myVSD);
00171                         std::cout<<"myVSD @ ["<<(void*) myVSD<<"]"<<std::endl;
00172                         std::cout<<"myCdcSD @ ["<<(void*) myCdcSD<<"]"<<std::endl;
00173                 }
00174                 else{
00175                         myVSD = pMyDetectorManager->GetSD("CDCLayer","CdcLayerSD");
00176                         if (myVSD){
00177                                 myCdcLayerSD = dynamic_cast<CdcLayerSD*> (myVSD);
00178                                 std::cout<<"myVSD @ ["<<(void*) myVSD<<"]"<<std::endl;
00179                                 std::cout<<"myCdcLayerSD @ ["<<(void*) myCdcLayerSD<<"]"<<std::endl;
00180                         }
00181                         else{
00182                                 myVSD = pMyDetectorManager->GetSD("","C/MonitorSD");
00183                                 myMonitorSD = dynamic_cast<MonitorSD*> (myVSD);
00184                                 std::cout<<"myVSD @ ["<<(void*) myVSD<<"]"<<std::endl;
00185                                 std::cout<<"myMonitorSD @ ["<<(void*) myMonitorSD<<"]"<<std::endl;
00186                         }
00187                 }
00188         }
00189         if ( minEleMom != -1*MeV ){
00190                 myMcTruthSvc = McTruthSvc::GetMcTruthSvc();
00191         }
00192         if ( minAntipNum != -1 || minTracks != -1 ){
00193                 myMcTruthSvc = McTruthSvc::GetMcTruthSvc();
00194         }
00195 }
00196 
00197 bool MyTriggerSvc::TriggerIt( const G4Event* evt ){
00198 
00199         if ( minCdcHits != -1 ){
00200                 int nHits_CDC = 0;
00201                 if (myCdcLayerSD){
00202                         nHits_CDC = myCdcLayerSD->Get_nHits();
00203                 }
00204                 else{
00205                         nHits_CDC = myMonitorSD->Get_nHits();
00206                 }
00207                 if ( nHits_CDC < minCdcHits ) return false;
00208         }
00209         if ( minM_Hits != -1 ){
00210                 int nHits = 0;
00211                 if (myMonitorSD){
00212                         nHits = myMonitorSD->Get_nHits();
00213                 }
00214                 if ( nHits < minM_Hits ) return false;
00215         }
00216         if ( minV_Hits != -1 ){
00217                 int nHits = 0;
00218                 if (myMonitorSD){
00219                         nHits = myMonitorSD->Get_nHits();
00220                 }
00221                 if ( nHits < minV_Hits ) return false;
00222         }
00223         if ( minCorM_Hits != -1 ){
00224                 int nHits = 0;
00225                 if (myMonitorSD2){
00226                         nHits = myMonitorSD2->Get_nHits();
00227                 }
00228                 int nHits_CDC = 0;
00229                 if (myCdcLayerSD){
00230                         nHits_CDC = myCdcLayerSD->Get_nHits();
00231                 }
00232                 else{
00233                         nHits_CDC = myMonitorSD->Get_nHits();
00234                 }
00235                 if ( nHits+nHits_CDC < minCorM_Hits ) return false;
00236         }
00237         if ( minEleMom != -1*MeV ){
00238                 bool foundit = false;
00239                 int nTracks = myMcTruthSvc->get_nTracks();
00240                 for ( int i = 0; i < nTracks; i++ ){
00241                         int pid = myMcTruthSvc->get_pid(i);
00242                         double px = myMcTruthSvc->get_px(i)*GeV;
00243                         double py = myMcTruthSvc->get_py(i)*GeV;
00244                         double pz = myMcTruthSvc->get_pz(i)*GeV;
00245                         double pa = sqrt(px*px+py*py+pz*pz);
00246                         if ( pid == 11 && pa > minEleMom ) foundit = true;
00247                 }
00248                 if (!foundit) return false;
00249         }
00250         if ( minAntipNum != -1 ){
00251                 bool foundit = false;
00252                 int nTracks = myMcTruthSvc->get_nTracks();
00253                 for ( int i = 0; i < nTracks; i++ ){
00254                         int pid = myMcTruthSvc->get_pid(i);
00255                         if ( pid == -2212 ) foundit = true;
00256                 }
00257                 if (!foundit) return false;
00258         }
00259         if ( minTracks!= -1 ){
00260                 int nTracks = myMcTruthSvc->get_nTracks();
00261                 if (nTracks<minTracks) return false;
00262         }
00263         //std::cout<<"Passed Cut!"<<std::endl;
00264 
00265         return true;
00266 }
00267 
00268 void MyTriggerSvc::ReSet(){
00269         minCdcHits = -1;
00270         minM_Hits = -1;
00271         minV_Hits = -1;
00272         minCorM_Hits = -1;
00273         minEleMom = -1*MeV;
00274         minAntipNum = -1;
00275         minTracks = -1;
00276 }

00278 void MyTriggerSvc::ShowOutCard(){
00279         std::cout<<"*************************Trigger settings"<<"***************************"<<std::endl;
00280         std::cout<<"minCdcHits =     "<<minCdcHits<<std::endl;
00281         std::cout<<"minM_Hits = "<<minM_Hits<<std::endl;
00282         std::cout<<"minV_Hits = "<<minV_Hits<<std::endl;
00283         std::cout<<"minCorM_Hits = "<<minCorM_Hits<<std::endl;
00284         std::cout<<"minEleMom=       "<<minEleMom/MeV<<", MeV"<<std::endl;
00285         std::cout<<"minAntipNum=     "<<minAntipNum<<std::endl;
00286         std::cout<<"minTracks =      "<<minTracks<<std::endl;
00287         std::cout<<"******************************************************************************"<<std::endl;
00288 }
